data.text: Booretare a waxɔnfe gbansan nan fenma,
Xaxilitare mu wama xaxili fanyi xɔn,
Mixi ɲaaxie yoma mixie ma,
Adama xa wɔyɛnyi tilin alɔ baa,
Nɔndi fife mixi ɲaaxi ma, a mu fan.
Lɔnnitare sɔnxɔɛ xɔrɛ isɔxɔma,
Xaxilitare dɛ a xun nakanama nɛ,
Naafixi xa masenyi luxi nɛ alɔ donse ɲɔxunmɛ,
Tunnaxɔnɛ nun kasarɛ raba,
Alatala findixi kantari sɛnbɛma nan na,
Naafuli findixi banna xa kantari nan na,
Gbaloe na yɛtɛ igboɲa xanbi ra,
Mixi naxan yaabi fima beenu a xa mixi xui ramɛ,
Xaxili limaniyaxi mixi malima nɛ a xa fure kui,
Lɔnnila katama se kolonde,
Kira rabixi mixi bɛ naxan ki tima,
Mixi naxan singe a yɛtɛ xun mafalama fe kui,
Fe lufe Ala ma a sɔnxɔɛ ɲɔnma nɛ,
Mixi konbixi xa bɔɲɛ xɔrɔxɔɛ luma nɛ alɔ taa makantaxi.
Adama xa masenyi nɔma a baloe fide a ma,
Faxɛ nun simaya fatanma mixi xa wɔyɛnyi nan na.
Ginɛ sɔtɔfe findixi hɛɛri nan na,
Setare mayandi tima,
Xa mixi booree wuya, na nɔma findide tɔɔrɛ ra a bɛ,
